title: Receiving Connection Issue with Client
body:
http://prntscr.com/danwuq

I'm unable to log in. I know it's not my connection since I'm doing everything else fine.

replies.body: We experienced some live service issues on the NA servers yesterday around the time you posted this discussion. These issues have since been resolved, so if you're still experiencing this, let me know.
i am also getting the exact same error for the past couple of mins.
